22b4('dul ba): par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim pa la gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /za ma
22b5('dul ba): dang ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / ma gsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba la
22b6('dul ba): gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur
22b7('dul ba): lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / gnas par mi bya ba dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas blangs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa'i dge
22b8('dul ba): slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong zhig gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa
23a1('dul ba): 'debs pa las de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma zhig gis dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa
23a2('dul ba): las de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis
23a3('dul ba): skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa
23a4('dul ba): sbom por 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs
23a5('dul ba): pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mi'i dge slong la
23a6('dul ba): mir 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab
23a7('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes pas pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du
23a8('dul ba): shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ dang po mtha' dang mtshams med pa/ /lhag ma dang ni gcig la gcig /bris pa dang ni bag tsam
23b1('dul ba): nyid/ /rgya cher bya ba nyid yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa las byung ba'i chos bsten to zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par rku ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/ bla mar gyur pa'i
23b2('dul ba): chos smra bas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas yo byad chen po rkus so zhes khas len pa de la dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par gsod pa 'am/ bla mar
23b3('dul ba): gyur pa'i chos smra ba 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi srog dang phral lo zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis
23b4('dul ba): par bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra ba 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa 'am/ rku bas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa smras so zhes khas len pa
23b5('dul ba): de la dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'am/ rku ba 'am/ srog gcod par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la
23b6('dul ba): gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par mtshams med pas
23b7('dul ba): skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma dang / pha dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /'on te gzhi med par dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas
23b8('dul ba): skur pa btab na nyes byas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor gang gis pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab pa de ni pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa yin no/ /gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa
24a1('dul ba): dang / ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab pa des ni nyes pa sbom por skur pa btab pa yin te/ nyes pa sbom pos ni dge slong ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/ de ni bshags par 'os pa yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge
24a2('dul ba): slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur na/ gal te gzhi ma mchis par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /gzhi
24a3('dul ba): ma mchis par so sor bshags par bgyi ba dang / nyes byas kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du gzhi ma mchis par nyes pa sbom pos skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun
24a4('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi med par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma
24a5('dul ba): la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mas dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge
24a6('dul ba): 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mas dge slong la pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slob mas dge slong ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par
24a7('dul ba): pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos
24a8('dul ba): kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge tshul gyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur
24b1('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge tshul mas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis bris
24b2('dul ba): nas 'di skad ces yi ge 'di las ni 'di skad du khyod mi tshangs par spyod pa'i pham pa byung zhes zer ro zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis
24b3('dul ba): skur pa btab kyang dge 'dun lhag mar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ yod de sngar ltung ba byung ba dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba la ni nyes byas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom
24b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas/ ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas/ dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la
24b5('dul ba): gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi skur pa btab pa las/ de dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung / ma dris kyang rung / rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin la/ rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha
24b6('dul ba): dang 'thun pa ma yin pas/ bag tsam las bsam pa tsam gyis chos 'ga' zhig blangs par gyur la/ dge slong de yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na/ dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba
24b7('dul ba): ste/ gzhung lhag ma ni gzhi med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bag tsam la rgya cher brjod par bya'o/ / sdom la/ bshes pa dang ni gsol ba dang / /gleng ba dang ni dran pa gnyis/ /bzhi pa 'dug dang ma bskos dang / /'dun pas gcig dang nam mkha'
24b8('dul ba): la/ /'dug pa rgyas pa nyid du bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang / dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par
25a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na/ dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig /dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa
25a2('dul ba): yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig / tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig /dge 'dun 'thun mi phyed/ kun du dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig /'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la
25a3('dul ba): ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa bde ba dang reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi
25a4('dul ba): de gtong na de lta na legs/ gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/ yang dag par
25a5('dul ba): bstan pa na/ gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/ gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las kyis
25a6('dul ba): bsgo bar bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi ba 'am 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang
25a7('dul ba): des 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags
25a8('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par bshes pa'i bsgo bar bgyid na bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/
25b1('dul ba): bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis te/ bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bzhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/
25b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro'o zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro
25b3('dul ba): ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar mi bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi
25b4('dul ba): 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas/ dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir
25b5('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsgo bar bgyi'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/ /
25b6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig ma glengs dran par ma bgyis par bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar mi bya'o/ /
25b7('dul ba): bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags so/ /btsun pa re shig glengs shing dran par bgyis pa las bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te
25b8('dul ba): bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags so/ /mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag gis mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam
26a1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams
26a2('dul ba): kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang
26a3('dul ba): na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams mnan cing / mtshams non par bgyis te/ mtshams su mchis nas bsgo na bsgo ba zhes
26a4('dul ba): bgyi 'am/ ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags so/ /btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bskos pa zhig gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis
26a5('dul ba): pa'i gang zag bzhi bskrad na/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid par bskos pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi zhig bskrad na/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi
26a6('dul ba): lags sam/ gal te des re re dang / gnyis gnyis dang / gsum gsum nas bskrad kyi bzhir ma yin na bskrad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams kyi nang phyogs bzhi na mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong mchis pa dag gis dge
26a7('dul ba): slong bzhi zhig la bsgo na bsgo bar yang chud la ltung ba gang du yang mi 'gyur zhing / des dge 'dun mi mthun par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor gal te phan tshun 'dun pa byin pas re re dang / gnyis gnyis dang /
26a8('dul ba): gsum gsum la bsgo'i bzhi la ma yin na yong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag byar mi rung bas so/ /las bgyid pa phyogs gcig na mchis pas gnas bzhi'i las thams cad bgyir rung lags sam/
26b1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi char gyi mtshams kyi mdo/ khri 'am khri'u 'am/ re lde 'am/ re ljong rings kyis mnan te 'dug par gyur la/ gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/ bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /
26b2('dul ba): lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las nye bar gnas par gyur na rung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag kha cig ni las byed pa yin la/ kha cig gi ni tshogs skyong ba yin no/ /sa la mchis pas nam mkha' la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na bsgo
26b3('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig las bgyid pa nam mkha' la mchis la/ sa la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun
26b4('dul ba): lhag mar 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang / dge slong ma la yang dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes byas sos/ /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la yang nyes byas
26b5('dul ba): kho na ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /de ltar na gzhung 'di ni dge 'dun lhag ma gsum la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya ba yin no/ /nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa kha che ba las/ dge 'dun lhag ma rdzogs s+ho// //
26b6('dul ba): sdom la/ mtha' dang lam dang rgyal rigs dang / /phung po de bzhin lhag ma dang / /kha dang sha kha ra dang hwags/ /bu ram mar gsar ma nges gnyis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom
26b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang / dben pa skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas
26b8('dul ba): chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/ dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/ dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/ dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las
27a1('dul ba): chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing / dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/ de ni ma nges pa'i chos so/ /yang dge slong
27a2('dul ba): gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang / dben pa skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed
27a3('dul ba): las chos gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/ dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na/ chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bar byed du gzhug cing dge slong la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan
27a4('dul ba): pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/ de yang ma nges pa'i chos so zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong
27a5('dul ba): rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i
27a6('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig
27a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang bdag gis mtha' gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na dge
27a8('dul ba): slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /dang po ji lta bar mtha' gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas
27b1('dul ba): 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis kha'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du
27b2('dul ba): stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du bcug cing /
27b3('dul ba): de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces 'dis kha'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas te/ 'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang / gci ba'i lam du nyams par byas so zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /kha'i lam du ji lta bar bshang
27b4('dul ba): ba'i lam dang / gci ba'i lam du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag dge slong zhig rgyal rigs ma zhig dang lhan cig
27b5('dul ba): tu nyams par bgyid pa bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe
27b6('dul ba): zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du
27b7('dul ba): gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces 'dis rgyal rigs dang lhan cig tu nyams par ni ma byas na/ 'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu nyams par gyur to zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /rgyal rigs mo dang ji lta bar bram
27b8('dul ba): ze'i mo'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs mo dang / dmangs rigs mo dang / dkar mo dang / sngon mo dang / sngo sangs mo dang / ring mo dang / thung du mo dang / sdug gu ma dang / skem mo dang / tshon mo dang / lus ngan ma dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang /
28a1('dul ba): 'gyel ba dang yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig mtha' dang po'i phung po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo / /
28a2('dul ba): zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces
28a3('dul ba): yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig tu byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te 'di skad ces mtha' dang po'i phung po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang ltung
28a4('dul ba): ba'i phung po gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod do/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag
28a5('dul ba): gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun lhag ma dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug
28a6('dul ba): ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i
28a7('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa nas/ bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /dang po
28a8('dul ba): la ji lta bar dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa
28b1('dul ba): dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis khar nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la
28b2('dul ba): de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug go/ /'on te 'di skad ces khar ni
28b3('dul ba): nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis so'i phyi rol mchu'i nang du khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ / btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun
28b4('dul ba): pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gci ba'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/
28b5('dul ba): mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing
28b6('dul ba): de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis brla phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang
28b7('dul ba): ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshang ba'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis
28b8('dul ba): bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen
29a1('dul ba): ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces bshang ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis rkub tsos kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /
29a2('dul ba): btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig
29a3('dul ba): gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid
29a4('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par skyo ma ni ma 'thungs kyi 'on kyang 'dis sha ka ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /btsun pa
29a5('dul ba): dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig bu ram gyi chang 'thung ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig
29a6('dul ba): gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na
29a7('dul ba): dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te 'di skad ces 'di dus ma yin par bu ram gyi chang ma 'thungs kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis hwags kyi chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/
29a8('dul ba): dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par sha za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge
29b1('dul ba): bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/
29b2('dul ba): gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sha ni ma zos kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis bu ram zhig zos so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug
29b3('dul ba): go/ /btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches par tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yis ches pa'i tshig
29b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar
29b5('dul ba): bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ /'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin pa'i zas ni ma zos kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis mar zos so zhes
29b6('dul ba): zer na/ dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /de lta bu'i dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa bden pa mthong ba smra ba gang dag yin pa de dag la dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ /nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa kha che ba las ma nges pa dang ldan pa rdzogs s+ho// //
29b7('dul ba): sdom la/ de nyid stor dang tshig pa dang / /sems 'khrugs byin gyis ma brlabs dang / /rung ba dang ni dus las 'das/ /mtshan dang bzhi dang bting ba'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
29b8('dul ba): chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o/ /de las 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa chos gos de nyid dgung bcu 'das pa yang lags la de nyid dgung gcig bral
30a1('dul ba): ba yang lags pa lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gis zhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/ chos gos med par mtshams kyi phyi rol du skya reng 'char bar byed na/ chos gos
30a2('dul ba): 'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yin la/ zhag gcig bral ba yang yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos nyams par gyur na/ ltung ba bshags par bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor 'ba' shig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o/ /
30a3('dul ba): gal te ltung ba bshags lags nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gi spang pa'i chos gos mes tshig gam zos par gyur na dum bu 'am/ de dag spang bar bgyi lags sam/
30a4('dul ba): nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /'ba' shig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o/ /'on te kun nas khru gang ba zhig yin na spang bar bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung lnga lon pa dang / sems 'khrugs par
30a5('dul ba): gyur na gang nas bzung ste/ de'i dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi lags/ gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so/ /btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhig byin gyis ma brlabs/ rung bar ma bgyis
30a6('dul ba): par nam 'tsho'i bar du bcangs na nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de dge slong gis nyi ma re re zhing chos gos las phyung ste/ gzhan byin gyis rlob na'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
30a7('dul ba): 'das kyis zhag bcu las 'das pa'i chos gos spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos lhag ma dgu bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis
30a8('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi rung bar gyur pa dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur te/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gi spu
30b1('dul ba): dang / ra bal dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / 'dres pa dang / thags su ma btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos ni zhag bcu las lhag par bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bcu'i
30b2('dul ba): bar du gos lhag pa bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa de dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos lhag pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ zhag bcu
30b3('dul ba): tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur na'o/ /btsun pa chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/ chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong
30b4('dul ba): de chos gos rin chen po 'chang na ltung ba med la/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang / de'i mtshan gyur nas dge slong mar
30b5('dul ba): red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong mas chos gos shig rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang / mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir
30b6('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung bcu la dgung bcur 'du shes te skya reng 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dgung bcu la dgung
30b7('dul ba): bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcu ma lags
30b8('dul ba): par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su chos gos shig rnyed la/ chos gos de yang spang bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/
31a1('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong gis chos gos spang ba yin la/ dge slong des kyang chos gos de ma spangs/ bral bar ma byas/ nyes pa ma bshags pa'i skabs su dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar gyur la/ sra brkyang bting nas dge slong
31a2('dul ba): des chos gos gzhan zhig rnyed na'o/ /btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong mas dgung bcu
31a3('dul ba): las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul mas dgung bcu las 'das par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur
31a4('dul ba): lags/ ltung ba med do/ /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhin no/ / sdom la/ dge 'dun gyi dang sa dang mtshams/ / mnan pa dang ni ma gnang dang / /mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yogs dang / /
31a5('dul ba): bzhi tshan dang ni de bzhin mtshan/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos
31a6('dul ba): gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis
31a7('dul ba): brlab par gnang lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gnang lags sam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ngo / /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlabs te/ chos
31a8('dul ba): gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol du bral bar bgyid na/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /chos gos de spang bar bgyi
31b1('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /'ba' shig pa'i ltung byed bshags par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la bzhag ste/ nam mkha' la skya reng 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gos nam mkha' la bzhag ste/ sa la skya reng 'char
31b2('dul ba): bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos mtshams kyi nang du bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi
31b3('dul ba): slad rol du skya reng 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gos mtshams kyi slad rol du bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi nang du skya reng 'char bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka'
31b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams mnan tam/ mtshams bzung ngam/ mtshams su 'greng ngam mchis te/ mtshams kyi bar du chos gos bzhag nas skya reng 'char bar bgyid na/
31b5('dul ba): chog gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong yang mtshams kyi nang na mchis la/ chos gos kyang mtshams kyi nang na mchis
31b6('dul ba): pa las/ chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ mtshams gcad par bya ba chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa ma byin na'o/ /btsun pa re shig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su
31b7('dul ba): gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi/ nye bar 'khor ji tsam gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor chab kung sa 'am/ sgo khyams sam khang phran nam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dge slong gis kun du spyad pa 'am/ ra ba 'am/
31b8('dul ba): 'greng rib bam/ 'obs yod pa'o/ /btsun pa dge slong yang gnas gcig la steng g.yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la/ de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/
32a1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar gnas de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu rnams sam/ spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad
32a2('dul ba): rol la/ mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes pa las skya reng 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /mtshams kyi slad rol na
32a3('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi
32a4('dul ba): slad rol du skya reng 'char bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma zhig gis mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya reng 'char bar bgyid pa las/
32a5('dul ba): mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gis ni dge slong gi mdun du chos gos
32a6('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dbyung ba dang rung
32a7('dul ba): bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pa chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol du skya reng 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du gyur te/ de bzhin du dge
32a8('dul ba): slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do/ /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no/ / sdom la/
32b1('dul ba): sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das/ /de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni/ /mi rung pa dang gding ba dang / /tshad dang bzhi tshan dag dang mtshan/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
32b2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas/ chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed la/ 'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o/ /blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar chos gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /gal te mi langs la
32b3('dul ba): kha ma langs pa kha skong pa'i chos gos la re ba yod na yang dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o/ /de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong
32b4('dul ba): gos shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ gang nas bzung ste de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi/ gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag
32b5('dul ba): par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ zla ba gcig tshun chad du dus byas na'o/ /btsun pa
32b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lags/ bdun po dag las brtags pa gang yang rung pa ngas rjes su gnang zhing
32b7('dul ba): ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla gcig las lhag par bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du
32b8('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ de 'di ltar chos gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / spun mi rung bar gyur la/ rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal
33a1('dul ba): dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang 'dres pa dang / thags su ma btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos ni zla ba gcig las lhag par bzhag kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du
33a2('dul ba): gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ chos gos de rnyed nas zhag sum bcu lon pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting bar
33a3('dul ba): gyur na'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gang chos gos gsum par gyur pa des chos gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du
33a4('dul ba): gzhag par bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor chos gos gsum tshang na chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung / mi langs kyang rung ste de thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no/ /chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba
33a5('dul ba): las gal te chos gos su langs pa zhig rnyed na de yang zhag bcu pa yin no/ /'on te ma langs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o/ /de las 'das par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung
33a6('dul ba): zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas skya reng 'char par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig
33a7('dul ba): tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/
33a8('dul ba): dge slong mar red nas dgung zla gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong mas chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas zla ba gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/
33b1('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal bas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong mas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/
33b2('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul mas chos gos dgung zla gcig gi bar du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no/ / sdom la/
33b3('dul ba): pho nya yi ge lag brda dang / /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang / /smyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang / tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang / /khyim pa mo la sogs pa ste/ /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
33b4('dul ba): ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshed du 'jug gam/ 'chag tu 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/
33b5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la pho nya las gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang / brgyud de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos
33b6('dul ba): rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa smyon ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa
33b7('dul ba): sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / 'on ma dang / glen ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim pa mo nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na
33b8('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa dang / dge slong ma khas len pa dang / ma ning mo dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / ma 'gums pa dang / pha 'gums pa dang / dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang / mu stegs can dang / mu
34a1('dul ba): stegs can zhugs pa dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa can dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis
34a2('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba'i dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/
34a3('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ bsgrub par bya dang bkrus pa dang / /dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang / mi rung ba dang spangs pa dang / /gzhan gyi dang ni gyon pa dang / /bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang / /dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/ /
34a4('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bkrus pa zhig 'khrur stsal na/
34a5('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la dge 'dun gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te gang zag gis yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyad de/ dri ma can du gyur
34a6('dul ba): pa zhig na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal pa las mtshan gyur te dge
34a7('dul ba): slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal pa las dge slong ma de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa
34a8('dul ba): re shig dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal pa las/ dge slong ma de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas bkrus na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin dge slong ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /
34b1('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur pa la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa
34b2('dul ba): dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi rung ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang 'dres pa dang / ma btags pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chos gos 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/
34b3('dul ba): nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnying pa spang ba zhig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /'on te spangs pa zhig
34b4('dul ba): 'khrur 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la gzhan gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gos rung ba dang / grong du
34b5('dul ba): 'jug pa spang ba 'byung ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong khyim du zhugs pa'i chos gos bshang ba 'am/ gci ba 'am/ 'dam rdzab 'am/ ljan ljin nam/ mi gtsang ba gzhan gyis sbags par gyur na'o/ /des de dge
34b6('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'khrur stsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen
34b7('dul ba): par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/
34b8('dul ba): nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par
35a1('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs te lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma
35a2('dul ba): rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung
35a3('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur
35a4('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so/ /nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos rnying pa 'khrur
35a5('dul ba): stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge
35a6('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye du lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur/ ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes
35a7('dul ba): gsungs pa gang lags pa/ dge slong ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / khyim pa mo dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas
35a8('dul ba): so/ /de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge slong mas dge slong dang / dge tshul dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang /
35b1('dul ba): kun du rgyu dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /khyim pa dang / khyim pa mo la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la ni nyes byas so/ /
35b2('dul ba): sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du 'tshed pa dang / 'chag pa la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ / sdom la/ pho nya yi ge lag brda dang / /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang / /smyon pa dang ni
35b3('dul ba): sems 'khrugs dang / /tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang / /gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang / /snyoms 'jug de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /khas len 'dod pa la sogs pa/ /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
35b4('dul ba): ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge
35b5('dul ba): slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la pho nya las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ /de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad

35b7('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / glen ma dang / 'on ma dang / gnyid log pa dang / phyag
35b8('dul ba): las khom pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas len pa dang / ma ning ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/ rgyas par dang po mi
36a1('dul ba): mthun pa can gyi bar la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun
36a2('dul ba): gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang / dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir
36a3('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan ni/ /gnyis dang de bzhin mtshan dang ni/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /tshogs su yang dag bshad pa yin/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma
36a4('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa las chos gos blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung ba dang / spun mi rung bar gyur la/ rgyu rung
36a5('dul ba): ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang 'dres pa dang / ma btags pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chos gos shig blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
36a6('dul ba): byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /dge slong ma nye du la
36a7('dul ba): nye du la ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge slong ma nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par
36a8('dul ba): rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas chos gos blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir
36b1('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes
36b2('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos blangs nas bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par
36b3('dul ba): ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par
36b4('dul ba): rdzogs kar blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /bsnyen par rdzogs
36b5('dul ba): nas bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /
36b6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong las chos
36b7('dul ba): gos len pa las dge slong de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong las chos gos len pa las dge slong de mtshan
36b8('dul ba): gyur te/ dge slong mar red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du lags pa'i dge slong las chos gos len pa las dge slong de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir
37a1('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong
37a2('dul ba): gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ dge slong ma dang / dge tshul mas len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge slong mas dge slong
37a3('dul ba): dang / dge tshul las len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /dge tshul gyis dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma
37a4('dul ba): las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no/ / sdom la/ pho nya yi ge lag brda dang / /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang / /smyon pa dang ni sems

37a6('dul ba): yang dge slong khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste chos gos slong na dus ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do/ /de la dus ni 'di yin te/ dge slong chos gos phrogs sam/ chos gos nyams sam/ chos gos
37a7('dul ba): tshig gam/ chos gos khyer ram/ chos gos rnyed na/ de la de ni dus yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis pho nya las khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur

37b4('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ / sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan ni/ /gnyis dang de bzhin mtshan dang ni/ /za ma ma ning nyid de bzhin/ /ma ning mo dang dge slong ma/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis

37b6('dul ba): rung ba dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi rung ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga mo'i bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra bal dang 'dres pa dang / thags su ma btags pa de lta bu'i chos gos
37b7('dul ba): shig slong na slong ba de la nyes byas so/ /chos thob na yang nyes byas kho na'o/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/

38b8('dul ba): dge slong des de la gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o/ /de las lhag par len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ snga ma slong ba'i spang pa'i ltung byed ji lta bar stod g.yogs
39a1('dul ba): smad g.yogs dang bcas pa la yang de 'dra'o/ /tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/ stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni gnyis te/ khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang / dge slong gi stod
39a2('dul ba): g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/ khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa las lhag par slong na/ lhag par slong ba

39a5('dul ba): par gyur na yang ma slong shig / lhag par gyur na yang ma sbyin cig /dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag par blangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis dge slong gi
39a6('dul ba): stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/ dge slong gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pas gal te ma chog par gyur na yang bslang bar bya'o/ /lhag par gyur na yang sbyin no/ /dge slong
39a7('dul ba): gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag pa ma byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /gzhung lhag ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi snga ma la ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ / sdom la/ pho nya yi ge
39a8('dul ba): lag brda dang / /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang / /smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang / /tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang / /gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang / /snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
39b1('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas chos gos kyi rin dag spags nas/ bdag gis chos gos kyi rin 'di dag gis chos
39b2('dul ba): gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'ongs pa dang de la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las/ de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs pas rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste bzang po 'dod pa'i
39b3('dul ba): phyir khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi phyir chos gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i chos gos kyi rin de dag gis
39b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis chos gos 'thag pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la chos gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces smras te/ chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun
39b5('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong pho nya las khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
39b6('dul ba): byas kho na'o/ /de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda dang / gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang / brgyud na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa/ smyon
39b7('dul ba): pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / 'on pa dang /

40a1('dul ba): rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ /chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ / sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan gnyis/ /de bzhin du ni mtshan yang dang / /za ma ma ning mo nyid dang / /ma
40a2('dul ba): ning dang ni dge slong nyid/ /btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/ khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/ rnam par rtog pa rig nas/ chos gos bslangs nas thob kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags
40a3('dul ba): sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la rgyu mi rung ba dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi rung ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang /
