247a7('dul ba): rung byin gyis brlabs nas mchis pa las btsun pa de ste skabs 'byed pa bcwa lnga pa'i skabs 'byed pa de nyid kyi tshe slar mchis na ci des kyang skabs dbye bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ de la ni skabs phye ba des chog go/ /btsun pa dge slong zhig
247a8('dul ba): skabs 'byed pa tshes bcwa lnga pa nyid kyi tshe spangs na de dang lhan cig skabs dbye bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong gi 'khor rnams ma langs ma dong pa'o zhes gsungs na/
247b1('dul ba): btsun pa ji tsam gyis na 'khor ma langs pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li gang du dge slong bzhi 'am lnga'am de las mang yang rung ste 'khod par gyur na ma langs pa zhes bya'o/ /bzhi las nyung na langs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa skabs dbye ba bcwa lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe stan las
247b2('dul ba): langs te song na dge slong mchis bzhin du 'tshal bar ma bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ ji ltar dge slong bshang ba dang gci ba'i sar song la de yang thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das pa'o/ /btsun
247b3('dul ba): pa skabs 'byed par bgyi ba skabs 'byed pa'i tshe mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nas skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhe bya'o/ /btsun pa skabs 'byed pa khyim pas phye na phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/
247b4('dul ba): u pA li skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za ma dang / ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas/ rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du yang skabs ma
247b5('dul ba): phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal bas skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge
247b6('dul ba): 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa skabs 'byed pa smyon pas skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du skabs 'byed pa sems
247b7('dul ba): 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa phrin
247b8('dul ba): gyis skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du spring yig dang / lag brda' dang / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de skabs
248a1('dul ba): phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gzhan zer ro zhes skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /
248a2('dul ba): btsun pa khyim pas grangs bskangs te skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za ma dang / ma ning dang mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa
248a3('dul ba): dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/ /btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te skabs phye na skabs phye ba
248a4('dul ba): zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / ra ro ba dang /
248a5('dul ba): snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te skabs phye na skabs phye ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ phul dang blangs dang dge 'dun
248a6('dul ba): dang / /bzhi pa dang ni gnyis dang mtshan/ /chad pa bral ba gcig nas gcig /lam dang mang po de bzhin no/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dad pa dang skabs phye ba blangs te steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams kyi slad rol du re ba ma mchis par mchis na dad pa dang skabs
248a7('dul ba): phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste re ba dang bcas pas mchis na ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin mod kyi 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa sa la gnas pa rnams kyis nam mkha' la
248a8('dul ba): gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang skabs dbye ba dbul du rung ngam/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa blang bar rung ngam/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyis sa la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang skabs dbye ba dbul du rung ngam/
248b1('dul ba): u pA li ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa rnams dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'khod pa rnams kyang rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'khod pa la dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul
248b2('dul ba): na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li phul ba zhes bya'o/ /sus bsgrag par bgyi/ sus kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa dge slong 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang
248b3('dul ba): 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na dad pa dang skabs
248b4('dul ba): dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin
248b5('dul ba): no/ /btsun pa mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dad pa dang skabs 'byed pa
248b6('dul ba): 'bul ba'i dge slong gis lus kyis dmigs kyi tshig gis ma lags na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshig du smras kyi lus kyis ma lags pa dang / tshig dang lus kyis dmigs pas kyang
248b7('dul ba): dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste lus kyis kyang ma dmigs tshig gis ma smras na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dad pa dang skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i dge slong
248b8('dul ba): mtshan gyur na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa chad pa bra bas dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li phul ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang
249a1('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa dad pa dang skabs dbye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de smras na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li phul ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang /
249a2('dul ba): skabs phye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun
249a3('dul ba): pa dad pa dang skabs 'byed pa 'bul ba'i dge slong dad pa dang skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i tshe za ma lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa de ste dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags par khas blangs pa dang /
249a4('dul ba): nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dad pa dang skabs dbye ba len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa dang skabs phye ba blangs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis te khyim pa
249a5('dul ba): lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma
249a6('dul ba): phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste za ma lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nas bslab pa stsal pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /skabs 'byed
249a7('dul ba): pa'i dngos po rdzogs so/ / // mdor na/ gru dang nam mkha' gsum pa dang / /spyod yul the tshom song ba dang / /mtshan dang gsum pa gnas rnams dang / /dbyar gsum pa dang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa dge slong gis phur pa la btags pa'i grur dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs
249a8('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su gru btang na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te steng gi nam
249b1('dul ba): mkha' las mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/
249b2('dul ba): u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la gzhal med khang du dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste gzhal med khang de nas gnas gzhan du mchis na dbyar zhig pa
249b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyod yul la brten te tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis spyod yul ma mchis par dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /
249b4('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong gis spyod yul la brten te dbyar tshul du zhugs par gyur na ci des der zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mchi ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ des de nyid la brten nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs
249b5('dul ba): te bdag tshul du zhugs sam ma zhugs zhes the tshom za zhing dogs par gyur na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste the tshom dang dogs pa las the tshom dang dogs pa bsal ma nus na des slar yang dbyar
249b6('dul ba): tshul du 'jug par bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du 'jug par bya'o/ /btsun pa de'i dbyar gyi tshul gang lags/ u pA li snga ma'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par bya'o snyam du song ste de der phyin pa dang skya reng shar nas dbyar
249b7('dul ba): phyi mar gyur na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des der tshul du 'jug par bsams pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste gnas 'dir bdag tshul du 'jug go zhes
249b8('dul ba): bsams nas des rkang pa ya gcig ni mtshams kyi nang du bzhag / rkang pa ya gcig ni mtshams kyi slad rol tu bzhag pa dang skya reng shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/
250a1('dul ba): u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des de ltar der tshul du 'jug par bsams pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa na mtshan gyur na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /
250a2('dul ba): des gnas der gnas par bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du song la gnas par gyis shig /btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhir dbyar tshul du zhugs kyang dbyar tshul du zhugs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/
250a3('dul ba): u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ 'od ma 'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /de gang du gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar ro/ /btsun pa de ste shing ngam/ 'od ma 'am/ re lde ni 'jig pa'i chos
250a4('dul ba): can du gyur na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /des dbyar gang du gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' ba'i gnas gcig tu'o/ /de'i dbyar gang du gtogs sems kyis gang du gnas par bsams pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni btang ba zhes bya'o/ /
250a5('dul ba): btsun pa de ste de phan chad zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs par gnas de nas gnyis por mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhi 'am de las mang ba rnams mtshams
250a6('dul ba): gcig tu bgyis te dbyar tshul du zhugs na gnas de dag thams cad du dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des gang du gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis
250a7('dul ba): gnas gcig tu dbyar tshul du zhugs te de slan chad gnas gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi par dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas gang du/ phyi mar ro/ /btsun pa gang la
250a8('dul ba): dbyar gyi tshul snga ma yang ma mchis/ phyi ma yang ma mchis na de'i ming ji skad ces bgyi/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa gang la snga ma dang phyi ma'i dbyar gyi tshul mchis la des kyang zhag bdun du byin gyis ma brlabs par
250b1('dul ba): mtshams kyi slad rol du don zhig gi slad du mchis te slar mchis bsams na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /ci des yang slar dbyar tshul du 'jug par bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ de'i yi dam las 'gal
250b2('dul ba): bas na nyes pa 'chags su chug shig / btsun pa ji srid du dbyar tshul du 'jug /u pA li zla ba gsum mo/ /btsun pa gang dbyar slad mar tshul du zhugs par gyur pa des ji ltar tshul nas 'byung bar bgyi/ nam zhugs pa na zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i
250b3('dul ba): grangs tshang ba 'am/ yang na rkyen cig byung na yang rung ngo / /mdor na/ skya reng bsam pa spang pa dang / /gnas dang shing rta ba lang khyim/ /shing dang grog po phug de bzhin/ /zhig pa 'gro yang de bzhin te/ /sde lnga dang ni bsam pa dang / /bdun po dang ni
250b4('dul ba): mi gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun 'khrugs nas der yang dge slong gis bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs dang / chos ma lags pa'i phyogs la gnas na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li de ste lta ba sgrogs
250b5('dul ba): bzhin pa las skya reng shar na ni dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi mdun du dbyar tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong ma mchis nas sems bskyed de dbyar
250b6('dul ba): tshul du zhugs na dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong yod bzhin na ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa dge slong dbyar gyi nang logs su spangs pa de dang lhan cig gnas su gnas par bgyi 'am/
250b7('dul ba): u pA li gnas par bya ste/ skabs phye nas ma gnas shig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gang dge slong gis gnas 'di na bdag la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu dag gis the tshom ma skyes pa dag ni
250b8('dul ba): mi skyed/ the tshom skyes pa ni sel bar byed pa yod dam med pa'i gnas rtogs la dbyar tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /
251a1('dul ba): btsun pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /de ste btsun pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i dge slong btsal 'tshal lam/ so sor thar pa 'don pa med
251a2('dul ba): na dbyar tshul du 'jug tu mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa shing rta spyod pa'i khyim 'am/ ba lang rdzi'i khyim du gnas te dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pA li de ste des 'di snyam du dbyar tshul gnas 'di nas gud du mi 'dong bar des bsams na rung ngo / /
251a3('dul ba): btsun pa de ste tshul du zhugs pa las dong na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa shing drung ngam/ ri phrag gam/ bug gam/ spyil bur dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa dge slong gis don zhig
251a4('dul ba): gi slad du zhag bdun nam/ bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mchis pa las de yang dus 'das par gyur na zhag bdun nam/ zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs pa de zhig ces bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ don gzhan gyi zad par
251a5('dul ba): gyis shig / btsun pa dge slong gis zhag bdun na skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste zhag drug gam/ lnga 'am/ bzhi 'am/
251a6('dul ba): gcig na tshul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas byin gyis brlabs par mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin gyis rlobs la song shig ces gsungs na/
251a7('dul ba): btsun pa gang gis byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pA li sde lngas so/ /gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ sems bskyed la tshig tu brjod par bya ste bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
251a8('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang gi gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma gsum tshul du zhugs te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba don 'di lta bu'i phyir mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi dbyar ni 'di nyid du gnas so/ /btsun pa gang gi don du byin gyis
251b1('dul ba): brlab par bgyi/ u pA li sde bdun gyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsol cig ces gsungs na/ gang la stsal bar bgyi/ u pA li sde lnga la'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dge 'dun gyi
251b2('dul ba): don gyi slad du ni zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa byin cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / bsnyen gnas dang / 'di las slad rol gyi
251b3('dul ba): mu stegs can dge sbyong gzhan bram ze dang / spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu ba rnams kyi don gyi slad du zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar bya'o zhes
251b4('dul ba): gsungs na/ btsun pa zhag sum cu rtsa dgu 'am/ zhag sum bcu 'am/ zhag nyi shur bsko bar rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du yang zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu 'am/ zhag sum bcu 'am/ zhag nyi shu 'am/ zhag bcu
251b5('dul ba): 'am/ zhag bdun du bsgo bar rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag sum bcu 'am/ zhag nyi shu 'am/ zhag bcu 'am/ zhag bdun du bsgo bar rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu'i
251b6('dul ba): steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na mtshams kyi nang du ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag
251b7('dul ba): bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag sum bcu 'am/ zhag nyi shu 'am/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar rung ngam/
251b8('dul ba): u pA li mi rung ngo / /u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi nang du ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum bcu rtsa dgur bsgo bar rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /
252a1('dul ba): btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum bcu 'am/ zhag nyi shu 'am/ zhag bcu 'am/ zhag bdun du bskor rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du yang zhag bdun du bsgor rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa
252a2('dul ba): las slob dpon dang mkhan po dus bgyis nas des gnas bca' ba ma rnyed de mchis na de dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /dbyar gyi dngos po rdzogs so// // mdor na/ lham gnyis lpags pa rnam gnyis dang / /dom lpags yang na
252a3('dul ba): mjug ma dang / /mal stan mtho dang mal stan che/ /lham yu can dang shing lham mo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lham mi rung ba rnam pa lnga ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa gzhan yang gcan gzan mi srun pa dang / ba lang ngan pa dang / rta ngan pa gzhan
252a4('dul ba): dag kyang mchis na de dag gi lpags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi 'am/ u pA li lham de dag kyang ma bcang shig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pas bsgos pa'i lham sman ma bor ba chongs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong khyim
252a5('dul ba): pas bor ba'i lham sman ma bcangs kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ /'di ltar yang dge slong des thams cad ri mo can nam/ gser gyis brgyan pa 'am/ dngul gyis brgyan pa bcangs pa'o/ /
252a6('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar yang des ri dgas phra mo 'am/ klus 'jigs par gyur na'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma 'chang shig /
252a7('dul ba): lpags pa'i steng du ma 'dug shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis lpags pa'i steng du 'dug pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li ji tsam rkub tsos bzhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa ji tsam gyis na nyal ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li lus kyis 'phres pa'o/ /
252a8('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lpags pa ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis lpags pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ na bas ni lpags pa chongs shig /mi na bas
252b1('dul ba): ni ma yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dom gyi lpags pa chongs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa ci nad pas bcang bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te mi na bas kyang bcang bar bgyi/ u pA li na ba dang / mi na ba gnyis kas chongs shig
252b2('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mjug ma lnga la 'jus te klung rgol cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa rkang pa bzhi pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na de dag gi las rgal bar yang rung ngam/ u pA li rgol cig /btsun pa de ste pho ma mchis na mo'i las rgal bar bgyi 'am/
252b3('dul ba): u pA li de ni bar chad cig byung na rgal bar bya'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mal stan mthon por ma 'dug shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa mal stan mthon po'i tshad ji tsam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad las lhag pa ni/
252b4('dul ba): mal stan mthon po'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams mal stan mtho zhing che ba la ma 'dug ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong mal stan mtho zhing che bar mchis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ /lha'i khyim
252b5('dul ba): dang / klu'i khyim dang / gnod sbyin gyi khyim dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / blon po'i khyim de dag tu stan gzhan med na'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis bzhon pa la 'tshal na nongs pa gsum du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar yang bzhon pa de mo
252b6('dul ba): yin pa dang / gser gyis brgyan par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ljongs kha ba can du lham yu ba can chongs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis de las gzhan pa'i ljongs su lham yu ba can bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis
252b7('dul ba): sam/ u pA li yod de/ gang du lham yu ba can med na 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis shing lham bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/
252b8('dul ba): u pA li yod de/ /chu yod pa'i yul chus gang bas shing lham med par 'gro bar mi nus pa der ro/ /lpags pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// // mdor na/ sman gnyis lan tshwa rnam pa gnyis/ /mar la rnam gnyis de bzhin te/ /sa dang btsos dang bu ram dang / /'bru mar phan
253a1('dul ba): pa tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/ btsun pa sman de nyid snga dro'i lags la de nyid slad dro'i yang lags de nyid zhag bdun pa'i yang lags/ de nyid nam 'tsho ba'i bar du spyad pa lags pa 'gyur ba mchis
253a2('dul ba): sam/ u pA li yod de/ bu ram shing ni snga dro'i 'o/ /khu ba ni phyi dro'i 'o/ /bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pA li zho ni snga dro'i 'o/ chu ni phyi dro'i 'o/ /mar ni zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal
253a3('dul ba): ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pA li sha ni snga dro'i 'o/ /zhag ni zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pA li 'bru ni snga dro'i 'o/ /'bru mar ni zhag bdun pa'i'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /
253a4('dul ba): btsun pa snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang / zhag bdun pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman 'di dag rnam phan tshun 'dres na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang /
253a5('dul ba): nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa dge slong gis snga dro'i dang / slad dro'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang / byin
253a6('dul ba): len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal na cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa dge slong mas snga dro ba'i dang / slad dro
253a7('dul ba): ba'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len byas pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong mas
253a8('dul ba): btsos pa rnams 'tshal na cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa dge slong gis blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan
253b1('dul ba): 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa dge slong mas blangs pa la byin len bgyi ba dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong mas btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan 'phos te
253b2('dul ba): dge slong phar gyur na cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa snga dro ba gang lags pa dang / slad dro ba gang lags pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang lags pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman rnams gang lags pa phan tshun 'dres te ma phyed na nam 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlabs
253b3('dul ba): tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ste/ snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang zhag bdun pa de rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bya ba byar mi rung ste/ byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ngo / /de ste snga dro ba'i dang / phyi dro ba'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i rnams dbye bar nus na byin gyis brlab tu rung ngo / /
253b4('dul ba): btsun pa mi rung ba zhig gis lan tshwa btsos nas 'tshal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li mi na bas bza' bar mi bya'o/ /sha las btsos pa 'am/ mar las btsos pa 'am/ 'bru mar las btsos pa yang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa mi rung ba'i lan tshwas 'bru mar
253b5('dul ba): ram mar btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa mar ram 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li bzar rung ngo / /btsun pa mar ram 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig tu 'dres par gyur pa 'tshal du rung ngam/
253b6('dul ba): u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa chang gis sbangs pa'i sman 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li na ba la ni rung gi mi na ba la ni ma yin no/ /btsun pa mi rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu zhig lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /
253b7('dul ba): mi rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/ de ste zhag gcig lon par ma gyur na ni bza' bar
253b8('dul ba): bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa la shing shing skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li bzar rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la mi rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs sam zhugs lce 'am/ zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyid
254a1('dul ba): na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ bgyis pa zhes brjod dam/ 'tshal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /rung pa'i sa na zhugs mchis la mi rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs su bcug na rung zhes bgyi 'am/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/
254a2('dul ba): 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li ma yin no/ /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs sam/ zhugs lce 'am/ zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyis na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/
254a3('dul ba): bza' bar bya'o/ /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs su stsal na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya'o/ /'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li bza' bar bya'o/ /mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gsum
254a4('dul ba): mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa'i zhugs lce des bsgral du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis pa zhugs lce
254a5('dul ba): des bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa de'i zhugs lces bsgral na de 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa
254a6('dul ba): na sgyed po gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung pa'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis la zhugs lce des bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gsum mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis na zhugs lce des bsgral na/
254a7('dul ba): 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa dge slong gis sa bon gyi rigs lnga la zhugs sam mtshon tam sen mos rung bar bgyid na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/ rung bar byas pas na bza' bar bya'o/ /
254a8('dul ba): mes rung bar byas pa ma gtogs te lhag ma rnams ni bza' bar bya'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis btung ba rnam pa brgyad 'thung shig ces gsungs na/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu dang / bsngal bar bsres pa 'di dag 'tshal du rung ngam/
254b1('dul ba): u pA li rung ngo / /btsun pa bu ram chab dgung bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /ji srid du btung bar bgyi/ dngos por ma gyur pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa mi rung ba'i sman bu ram du bsgral ba 'tshal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa
254b2('dul ba): nad pa'i g.yog ji ltar bgyi/ ston pa'i 'du shes pas sman phan pa dang 'thun pas g.yog bya'o/ /btsun pa nad pa la ci stsal bar bgyi/ u pA li rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs par gang gis nad pa sos par 'gyur ba de dag byin cig /mdor na/
254b3('dul ba): 'ug pa 'ol ba bya rgod dang / /bya rog kang ka chu skyar mo/ /mi ro za'i bya rnams dang / /sen mo mchu stobs gang ldan pa'o/ /btsun pa 'ug pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /'ol ba'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / bya rog gi sha dang / bya kang ka'i sha dang /
254b4('dul ba): chu skyar mo'i sha dang / gzhan yang mi ro 'tshal ba rnams dang / sen mo dang mchu stobs dang ldan pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ srog chags kan du sha dang pad pa dang / /srin bu sbal pa 'ang de bzhin te/ /sre mo sbrul dang go d+ha dang / /spal pa dkar
254b5('dul ba): po bong bu rnga mo sbas/ /btsun pa srog chags kan du sha'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa pad pa'i sha dang / sbal pa'i sha dang / sre mo'i sha dang / sbrul gyi sha dang / go d+ha'i sha dang / sbal pa dkar po'i sha dang / sram gyi sha dang / bya rog gi
254b6('dul ba): sha dang / gzhan yang chu na gnas pa dang / sen mo dang / mche ba stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang mi ro za ba de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ bal glang dang yang wa dang rta/ /spre'u dang mi yang de bzhin te/ /seng ge stag dang dom dag dang / /
254b7('dul ba): sen mo mche ba gang mthu ldan/ /btsun pa ba lang gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa rta dang wa'i sha dang / spre'u'i sha dang / mi'i sha dang / seng ge'i sha dang / stag gi sha dang / dom gyi sha dang / gzhan yang rkang bzhi pa sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs dang ldan
254b8('dul ba): pa de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa gang gi sha 'tshal du mi rung ba de'i zhag dang / 'o ma 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pA li gang gis sha mi rung ba de'i thams cad kyang mi rung ba'o/ /
255a1('dul ba): btsun pa sha rjen 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /bdag gi phyir bsad pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /sman gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bcwa brgyad pa/ mdor na/ dbyar gnyis bye bar gyur pa'i gnas/ /
255a2('dul ba): rnyed dang dge 'dun dag gi gnyis/ /smyos pa chad pa gsum pa dang / /sbyor ba 'gron pa mang po dbyar/ /btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la chos gos 'di 'bul lo zhes mchi ste/ dbyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos shig phul na de
255a3('dul ba): la dbyar gyi zla ba tha mar yang ma gyur la/ gtan pa yang ma bting na gang gis 'thob/ u pA li dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis chos gos 'di ni dbyar tshul du zhugs pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes mchi ste/ dbyar tshul du zhugs
255a4('dul ba): pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul na der dbyar gyi zla ba yang tha mar gyur la gnas der gtan pa bting na gang gis 'thob/ dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gnas 'dir dge slong gang gnas pa de dag la
255a5('dul ba): chos gos 'di 'bul lo zhes mchi ste/ gos shig phul na gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas/ bcu pa'i bar du rgyas par de dag la phul na gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /btsun pa khyim bdag
255a6('dul ba): cig gis dge 'dun la gos shig phul te/ gos 'di ni gnas 'dir sang phod gnas pa'i dge slong de dag la 'bul lo zhes mchi na gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas lo bcu'i bar du gnas pa de dag la dbul
255a7('dul ba): lo zhes mchi na gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /'on te gnas de na da ltar mi gnas par gyur na dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li bgo bar gyis shig /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun dag bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa
255a8('dul ba): de dag stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi gnas su ring du gnas par gyur pa las dge 'dun bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa de dag stsal bar bgyi 'am/ byin cig /su la phyogs gnyis ka la'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong
255b1('dul ba): gis lhung bzed dang chos gos btsal te mchis na de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur na de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal tam/ u pA li byin cig su la/
255b2('dul ba): gang la btsol pa 'am bsngos par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ ma sbyin cig /de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su yun ring du gnas par gyur te dus 'das na dbyar gyi rnyed
255b3('dul ba): pa stsal tam/ u pA li byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /'on te su la'ang bsngos par gyur pa ma mchis na su la stsal/ dge 'dun la'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na de la
255b4('dul ba): dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ sbyin par bya'o/ /de la ji tsam zhig stsal/ dge tshul pha'i skal ba'o/ /de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na ji tsam stsal bar bgyi/ dge slong gi skal ba'o/ /btsun pa
255b5('dul ba): dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi 'am/ mi sbyin no/ /de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi
255b6('dul ba): 'am/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig ma ning lags par khas blangs pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /
255b7('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / sngar nyes pa byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pa rnams lags par khas blangs na de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi 'am/
255b8('dul ba): u pA li mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas rab tu shes na/ de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong lags par khas blangs pa dang / mi gnas
256a1('dul ba): pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams lags par khas blangs na/ de dag dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi 'am/ u pA li mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa de ste yang dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas sam dbyar rangs par gnas
256a2('dul ba): pa de dag la khas blangs na de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhi nas chos gos kyi skal ba bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/
256a3('dul ba): 'di ltar yang dge slong des gnas bzhi char mtshams gcig tu byas nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /btsun pa ji tsam gyis na chos gos rnyed pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li 'di lta ste/ 'di ni bdag gi chos gos so snyam nas mig gis mthong bar gyur pa 'am/
256a4('dul ba): lag pa 'am/ phrag pa 'am/ pang par bzhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gcig pus dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong gcig pu gnas par gyur
256a5('dul ba): la/ de yang mi dag gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gos phul na'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa btags pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ dge 'dun la bsngos par gyur pa'o/ /
256a6('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong smyon pa/ chos gos bged par bsko bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa dge slong dmus long chos gos bged par bsko
256a7('dul ba): bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa smyon pa'i chos gos gang nas bzung ste bsngo bar bgyi/ nam rang gi sems sor chud pa tshun chad do/ /btsun pa smyon pa las chos gos blang bar bgyi 'am/ mi blang bar bgyi/ kha cig las ni blang bar bya/ kha cig
256a8('dul ba): las ni mi blang bar bya'o/ /gang las blang bar bya/ gang la pha 'am/ ma 'am/ spun nam/ sring mo gson pa 'am/ rang gi khyim nas byung yang rung ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes kyang yod pa'o/ /btsun pa dbyar zhig pa las dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar
256b1('dul ba): bgyi 'am/ kha cig la ni sbyin/ kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/ /gang la mi sbyin zhe na/ gang la dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang med la phyi ma'i tshul yang med par shes pa'o/ /gang la sbyin par bya zhe na/ gang la dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang yod la/ phyi ma'i yang
256b2('dul ba): yod par shes pa'o/ /btsun pa nad g.yog gi sbyor ba btang bar gyur te gzhan la yang spro bar bgyis la nad pa yang dus bgyis na nad g.yog gang la gos stsal bar bgyi/ phyi ma la'o/ /btsun pa nad g.yog mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa
256b3('dul ba): las nad pa dus bgyis na nad g.yog de la gos stsal bar bgyi 'am/ de ste nad pa'i don zhig la song bar gyur na de la nad g.yog gi gos sbyin par bya'o/ /'on te gzhan gyi don zhig la song na ni mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa nad g.yog gnas gzhan du dbyar
256b4('dul ba): tshul du zhugs par gyur na de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge tshul phas nad g.yog bgyis na de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong
256b5('dul ba): mas nad g.yog bgyis pa las nad pa dus bgyis na de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi sbyin no/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos rnyed na blang bar bgyi 'am mi blang bar bgyi/
256b6('dul ba): u pA li de ste tshong pas byin na blang bar bya'o/ /'on te rkun pos byin na de'i tshe mi blang ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dbyar gyi nang logs su dbyar gyi rnyed pa ma 'god cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis gnas
256b7('dul ba): mang zhig nas dge slong dag mgron du bos te gnas gcig tu 'tshal ma 'tshal nas dge 'dun dag la mngon sum du gos phul na dge slong de dag gis gos bgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li gos de dag ni rkyen 'byung ba'i gos pas bgo bar bya'o/ /
256b8('dul ba): btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo bar bgyi 'am/ shi ba'i gos bas na bgo bar bya'o/ /mdor na/ grong gnyis spu can phyi rol mtshams/ /de bzhin du yang mchod rten no/ /mtshams las
257a1('dul ba): bsngos par byas pa dang / /chad pa tha mar gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa grong gi nang na gtsug lag khang zhig mchis la der dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams don cig gi slad du mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis par gyur pa dang / de'i mtha'
257a2('dul ba): na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag grong khyer gyi mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las der mi dag gis dge 'dun la dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhig phul na gang gis 'thob/ grong khyer gyi dge 'dun gyis so/ /btsun pa grong khyer du dge 'dun tshul du zhugs nas dbyar
257a3('dul ba): gyi nang logs su bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang gis 'thob/ u pA li chos la phyogs pas so/ /btsun pa dge slong gis spu can las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs na byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ gos gzhan zhig yod na ni byin
257a4('dul ba): gyis ma brlab shig / byin gyis brlabs na ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag nyid kyis bdag gir bgyis na cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa dbyar tshul
257a5('dul ba): du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun dbyar gyi nang logs su mchod rten gyi rnyed pa bgos kyang nongs par mi 'gyur zhing rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ nyan thos kyi mchod rten la bsngos par gyur pa ni shi ba'i yo byad bas na bgo bar bya'o/ /
257a6('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pas bgo bar gyis shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis gum pa'i yo byad byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na gum pa'i yo byad
257a7('dul ba): kyi skal ba stsal tam/ u pA li sbyin no/ /de ste byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na stsal tam/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa gum pa'i yo byad dang gos byin gyis ma brlabs par dge slong gzhan dag cig mchis na de dag la gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal
257a8('dul ba): pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste byin gyis brlabs nas mchis na stsal bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad rnams gsol ba dang las kyis byin gyis
257b1('dul ba): rlobs shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu mchis na des ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pA li dge slong des sems bskyed nas tshig tu smra bar bya ste/ bgo ba las rdzas 'di ni bdag gis 'thob pas na/
257b2('dul ba): bdag gis chos gos 'di bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gir bya'o/ /'di ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gnas gang na dge slong gnyis sam gsum yang rung gnas na de dag kyang gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o/ /btsun pa
257b3('dul ba): gos ma dras pa la byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa de dang 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /gos kyi dngos po rdzogs so// // mdor na/ rnying pa gnyis dang bzhag pa dang / /sar pa gtan pa zhigs pa dang / /
257b4('dul ba): zin pa dang ni ma zin pa/ /dus su rnyed dang ma bgos gnyis/ /mi rung mtshams kyi phyi rol dang / /ma bgos gang zag de bzhin bcu/ /btsun pa gos rnying pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang
257b5('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /gos rnying pa gang zhe na gang gis sngar dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting bar gyur pa'o/ /gos rnying pa bcangs pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /
257b6('dul ba): gos rnying par bcangs pa gang zhe na gang dge slong gis spyad pa'o/ /btsun pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gang
257b7('dul ba): zhe na/ spangs pa'o/ /btsun pa gos sar pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gos sar pa gang zhe na/ gang dge 'dun gyis thog mar gtan par bting
257b8('dul ba): ba'o/ /btsun pa brtan pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gtan pa'i gos gang zhe na/ gos gang dbyar tha ma'i zla ba la rnyed pa'o/ /btsun pa gos
258a1('dul ba): zhigs pa zhig gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gos zhigs pa gang zhe na/ gos rul pa'o/ /btsun pa gos ma lags pa zhig gtan par bting na bting ba
258a2('dul ba): zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gos lags pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur
258a3('dul ba): ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par thing shig ces gsungs na/ dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dus kyi gos gang zhe na/ gos gang zla ba
258a4('dul ba): gsum 'das nas de nyid kyi nya bri zhag cig la rnyed pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes gsungs na/ ma gyon pa'i gos gang lags/ sar pa btags ma thag pa'o/ /btsun pa
258a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos rung ba gtan par thing shig ces gsungs na/ bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya'o/ /gos ma gyon pa rung ba gang zhe na/ kha dog can no/ /btsun pa mi rung ba'i gos shig
258a6('dul ba): gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mi rung ba'i gos gang zhe na/ rang gi rgyus mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa gos sam gtan par bting bar ma bgos pas gtan
258a7('dul ba): pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol du bskos pa'i chos gos gtan par 'ding na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/
258a8('dul ba): dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa bting ba chad pas bcad pas gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa de bzhin du gtan pa
258b1('dul ba): 'ding ba chad pa khor ba dang / yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa dang / dbyar ma mchis pa dang / zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / smyon pa rnams kyis
258b2('dul ba): gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ lnga pa gnyis dang sems gnyis dang / /shol bor gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ /bud med mtshan dang gtan pa dang / /
258b3('dul ba): gnas la rnam pa drug tu bya/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag lnga gtan pa 'ding bar mi bsko ste/ de ni chad pa bgyid pa dang / chad pa khor ba dang / yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa
258b4('dul ba): rnams so zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa'i gang zag cig gis gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa de bzhin du chad pa khor ba dang /
258b5('dul ba): yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang
258b6('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /gzhan yang gang zag lnga gtan pa 'ding bar mi sko ste/ dbyar med pa dang / dbyar zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / spangs pa rnams so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
258b7('dul ba): 'das kyis gzhan yang gang zag lnga ste/ dbyar med pa dang / dbyar zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / spangs pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na bting bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa
258b8('dul ba): de ste dbyar ma mchis pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa gang gis ma bting ba lags/ u pA li 'di ltar dge tshul pha dbyar
259a1('dul ba): tshul du zhugs pa la dbyar phyi ma'i gnas su bsnyen par rdzogs te zla ba gsum 'das pas gtan pa bting na de la gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pA li zla ba gsum 'das nas gtan pa zhes bya ste de yang zla ba gsum
259a2('dul ba): du mngon no/ /u pA li gang phyi mar zhugs pa las rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs la de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i dge slong dang lhan cig gtan pa bting na de ni gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pA li zla ba gsum lon nas gtan pa bting ba
259a3('dul ba): zhes bya ste/ de zla ba gsum ma lon par mngon no/ /btsun pa dbyar zhig pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa gang gis bting ba zhes
259a4('dul ba): bgyi/ gang gis ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li gang gis dbyar snga mar yang shes pa med la dbyar phyi ma'i tshul yang med pa ste/ de zla ba gsum du dge slong dang lhan cig gnas pa dang gcig car gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /
259a5('dul ba): u pA li zla ba gsum gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni zla ba gsum du shes pa'ang med do/ /u pA li gang dbyar snga mar gnas pa 'am/ phyi ma'ang shes la des zhag bdun nam/ bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs nas mtshams kyi phyi rol
259a6('dul ba): du song nas skya reng shar ba de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de la yang zla ba gsum du mngon no/ /yi dam las 'gal bas nyes
259a7('dul ba): byas su 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa zhig gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li kha cig ni gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa gang gis gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li gang
259a8('dul ba): dbyar snga mar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa de dag lhan cig tu gtan pa 'ding na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa
259b1('dul ba): zhes bya ste/ de ni zla ba gsum du shes pa'ang med do/ /u pA li dge 'dun thams cad dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs la zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa 'ding na de dag ni gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas
259b2('dul ba): gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de dag ni zla ba gsum du mngon no/ /btsun pa dbyar gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li kha cig ni gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /
259b3('dul ba): btsun pa gang gis gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/ gang gis gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li dge slong dag mtshams so sor bcad pa'i gnas na dbyar gzhan du gnas la gzhan du song ste gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes
259b4('dul ba): bya'o/ /u pA li gtan pa gang zhe na zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa bting ba de la ni zla ba gsum du shes pa yang med do/ /u pA li gang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /
259b5('dul ba): de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la mtshams chen po bkrol te gnas bzhi 'am lnga'i mtshams gcig tu byas nas gtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du gnas la gnas gzhan du gtan pa bting ba zhes
259b6('dul ba): bya'o/ /btsun pa spangs pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa gang gis gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li dbyar tshul du zhugs
259b7('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gang la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis spangs pa'i las byas pa de dag kyang bzod pa ma gsol bar dbyar gnas pa dag kyang lhan cig gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /gang gi bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li
259b8('dul ba): dge slong gang dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du mi spyod pa'i sdom pa bcas par gyur tam/ bskar ba'i las byas par gyur la/ des kyang bzod pa gsol na dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang lhan cig tu gtan pa
260a1('dul ba): bting na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gtan pa 'ding bas gtan pa blangs nas bkru ba dang / brkyang ba dang / dra ba dang / btsem pa thams cad dang / khab so tha ma'i bar du thog mar 'gro bar byos la bdag gis chos
260a2('dul ba): gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding bar bya/ gding ngo / /bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems rnam pa gsum skyed cig /sems rnam pa gsum bskyed kyang chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding bar bya/ bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems rnam pa gnyis
260a3('dul ba): bskyed na gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa sems bskyed pa gcig gis gtan pa gding du rung ngam/ u pA li rung ste/ 'di ltar yang gtan pa gding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa gding bar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gos 'dis
260a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding ngo zhes sems bskyed na gtan pa gding ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe rgyal pos shol bor na dge slong de dag gis gtan pa ji ltar gding bar bgyi/ ji ltar tshul nas byung ba bzhin no/ /
260a5('dul ba): btsun pa gtan pa de nyid rung la de nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong de dag kha cig ni shol bor/ kha cig shol ma bor bar tshul du zhugs te de nyid du khyim bdag gis shol ma bor ba'i gnas su tshul nas
260a6('dul ba): 'byung ba de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la dge 'dun gnyi ga la zan byin te gtan pa'i gos phul na gos de shol ma bor ba la ni rung ngo / shol bor ba la ni mi rung ngo / /btsun pa gang ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag gis ni gtan pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la
260a7('dul ba): thun mong ba ni du/ thun mong ma lags pa ni du/ u pA li thog ma dang tha ma ma gtogs par lhag ma rnams ni thun mong ba'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe mtshan gyur na gtan pa 'ding ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba
260a8('dul ba): zhes bya ste/ gtan pa sbed pa'i dge slong dad par byos shig /btsun pa gtan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ gtan pa 'ding ba zhes kyang bgyi/ gtan pa 'byin pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa gtan pa ni gang / gtan pa 'ding ba ni gang / gtan pa 'byin pa ni gang lags/
260b1('dul ba): u pA li gos ni gtan pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa ni gtan pa 'ding ba'o/ /ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po ni gtan pa 'byin pa'o/ /btsun pa dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi 'am lnga mtshams kyi nang du bgyis nas dbyar tshul du zhugs te de dag tshul nas byung ste/ gtan pa bting na
260b2('dul ba): gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /
260b3('dul ba): gnas de dag thams cad gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste so sor mtshems bcad nas gtan pa phyung na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ gang dag 'byin pa de
260b4('dul ba): dag ni gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang dag mi 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa ma phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa tshul nas byung ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi 'am/ lnga mtshems gcig tu byas nas gtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa
260b5('dul ba): bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ de dag thams cad du gtan
260b6('dul ba): pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa de ste so sor mtshams bkum nas gtan pa phyung na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin te/ gang 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang mi 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa ma
260b7('dul ba): phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /mdor na/ zla ba gsum dang lnga pa dang / /gso sbyong gi ni mtha' lnga gsum/ /sbyar ma dang ni ras chen rkyen/ /'byin pa gnyis dang bye ba gnyis/ /tshad gnyis pa yang de bzhin te/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /
260b8('dul ba): btsun pa ji srid cig tu gtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pA li zla ba gsum ste/ ji ltar zla ba gsum du gnas par tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /btsun pa ji srid cig tu gtan pa bcang bar bgyi/ zla ba lnga'o/ /btsun pa gang dbyar phyi ma'i mthar gtan pa bting ba
261a1('dul ba): na de dag kyang zla ba lngar gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ram/ u pA li gang gis gtan pa ji ltar bting bar gyur pa de dag gi grangs bzhin zla ba lngar bcang bar bya'o/ /btsun pa gso sbyong gi mthar gtan pa gding bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li gso sbyong gi mthar
261a2('dul ba): bya'o/ /btsun pa gso sbyong gi mthar dbyung bar bgyi 'am/ u pA li gso sbyong gi mthar bya'o/ /btsun pa dbyar ma rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du/ rkyen du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyu lnga dang rkyen lnga'o/ /lnga po de dag gang zhe na dge slong dang bcas sgo
261a3('dul ba): glegs dang bcas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas dogs pa dang bcas pa'i yul dang char 'bab pa 'am/ char 'bab par dogs par gyur pa dang / dus ma yin par grong gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod par gyur pa dang / gnas na gtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang /
261a4('dul ba): gsol ba dang las ni tha ma'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du rkyen du/ u pA li gsum ste/ char pa mi 'bab cing char pa 'bab par mi dogs par gyur pa dang / dus ma yin par grong gzhan nam grong khyer gzhan nam klung rgal 'dod
261a5('dul ba): par gyur pa dang / klung gi drung ngam khron pa'i drung na mi gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen ji srid du bcang bar bgyi/ zla ba phyed dang lnga'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su rkyen med par 'gyur ba du/ u pA li bcu ste/ zhag gcig gis
261a6('dul ba): 'bral ba med pa dang / zhag bcu las 'da' ba med pa dang / zla ba gcig las 'da' ba med pa dang / gos ma bsngos pa rnams bcang ba dang / chos gos stod g.yogs dang mthang gos gnyis pus ljongs spyod du 'gro ba dang / mang po za ba med pa dang / yang
261a7('dul ba): yang za ba med pa dang / spyan ma drangs par 'gro ba dang / gos rnams ci bder tshol ba dang / ston zla tha chung nas/ dpyad zla ra ba'i bar du ste/ gang gi rnyed pa thob pa de dag ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /btsun pa ci bslab pa'i
261a8('dul ba): gnas sam/ chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ma mchis par 'gyur ram/ u pA li ma yin te/ 'di dag ni yon tan no/ /btsun pa gsol ba dang las ma byas pas sngar gtan pa dbyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ 'di ltar
261b1('dul ba): yang dge slong gzhi pa de dag gis de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la gtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang / dge slong glo bur pa mang zhig lhags nas de dag ni de'i nyin mo bcwa lngar gyur te/ gso sbyong byed/ so sor thar pa klog pa dang / de ste dge slong gzhi pa rnams
261b2('dul ba): kyang de dag gi rjes su zhugs nas gso sbyong byas na gsol ba dang las ma byas par gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dge slong gzhi pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting ste mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa dang / glo bur du dge slong rnams lhags te
261b3('dul ba): gtan pa phyung na phyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pA li gang gis gtan pa bting ba de nyid kyis gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun bye na gang gis gding / chos bzhin du smra
261b4('dul ba): ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa sus 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so/ /btsun pa de ste mngon du gyur pa las rnyed na sus 'thob/ chos kyi phyogs kyis so/ /btsun pa tshad las chung ba'i chos gos
261b5('dul ba): dum bur sbyar te gos su btsems shing / gtan par bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa tshad las chung ba zhig gtan par bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /
261b6('dul ba): btsun pa gos ji lta bus gtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pA li mchur lnga zheng du gsum pas so/ /btsun pa gtan pa bting ba khyim pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang
261b7('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du gtan pa 'ding ba ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa nas/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /
261b8('dul ba): btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba za ma zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang /
262a1('dul ba): bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba smyon ba zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/
262a2('dul ba): u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste dge slong gi 'du shes yod la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding ngo / /bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems bskyed na gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba
262a3('dul ba): rnams su shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa gding ba glen pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba
262a4('dul ba): gzhan du gnas pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gtan pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// // mdor na/ gang du gang gis mtshams bzhi dang / /bsgo ba
262a5('dul ba): gos dang gso sbyong bzhi/ /gtan bzhi bye ba gang zag go/ /btsun pa yul kau sham+bIr dge 'dun gang gi tshe bye bar gyur/ nam mtshams kyi nang na gcig pu gnas pa las gso sbyong byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad
262a6('dul ba): par byas pa na'o/ /btsun pa yul kau sham+bIr dang po dge 'dun gang gis phye/ chos ma yin par smras pas de dag gis thog mar mtshams kyi nang du gso sbyong dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pas so/ /btsun pa yul
262a7('dul ba): kau sham+bI pas mtshams bshig na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa de ste yul yangs pa can na gnas pas mtshams bshig na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge
262a8('dul ba): 'dun bye nas phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas pa la zla ba phyed phyed cing lung 'bog pa dang bstan par bgyi 'am/ btsun pa 'di skad du sring mo rnams je 'thun par gyis ces sgo shig /btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs su gnas pa'i dge slong ma dag gis zla
262b1('dul ba): ba phyed phyed cing lung 'bog cing bstan pa btsal bar bgyi 'am/ btsal bar bya'o/ /su las btsal/ chos la phyogs pa las so/ /btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bye nas phyogs gnyis su gnas pa dag gis dge slong ma dag la lung 'bog cing bstan pa
262b2('dul ba): stsal bar bgyi 'am/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mi bye bar bya ba'i phyir byin cig /btsun pa yul kau sham+bIr phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par byed na gzu bos gang du dge slong ma la lung 'bog par bgyi/ mtshams kyi phyi rol song ba'o/ /
262b3('dul ba): btsun pa yul kau sham+bIr phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par gyur la/ dge slong gzu bo dag kyang mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis par gyur pa dang / khyim bdag gcig mchis nas dge 'dun la gos shig phul na gang gis 'thob/ phyogs
262b4('dul ba): gnyis kas so/ /yul kau sham+bI na gnas pas yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /yul yangs pa can na gnas pas yul kau sham+bIr gnas
262b5('dul ba): pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /gzu bo rnams yul kau sham+bI na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/
262b6('dul ba): u pA li ma yin no/ /gzu bo dag yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /de ste byed na gzu bo'i dngos po med do/ /btsun pa gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su
262b7('dul ba): dge 'dun bye na gtan pa gang gis gding bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba dag gis so/ /btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na gtan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa gang nye bar
262b8('dul ba): phyogs pa de thams cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/ nye ba 'khor nye bar phyogs pa so sor gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ so sor gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa'ang yod/ nye bar yang ma
263a1('dul ba): phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod do/ /nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni gang dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur pa ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par ma gyur pa dang / slar
263a2('dul ba): las ma byas pa'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa'o/ /so sor gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa ni 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa dang / slar
263a3('dul ba): las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig par lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa dang / dngos po lnga la yang nye bar phyogs par ma gyur pa'o/ /nye bar yang phyogs la so sor yang gnas pa ni de 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par
263a4('dul ba): yang gyur la/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis kyang spangs par gyur pa dang / slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa'o/ /nye bar phyogs pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni
263a5('dul ba): rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang nye bar phyogs pa de na cang mi gnas pa lags sam/ nye bar phyogs pa mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod mi gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yod/ nye bar
263a6('dul ba): yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod do/ /nye bar phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur la/ phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar ma gyur pa'o/ /mi gnas la nye bar yang
263a7('dul ba): ma phyogs pa ni de 'di ltar dge slong de phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur la/ dngos po lnga la ni nye bar ma phyogs pa yin no/ /nye bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yin pa ni 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par
263a8('dul ba): gyur cing phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba yin no/ /nye bar phyogs pa yang ma yin la mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang so sor gnas pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/
263b1('dul ba): so sor gnas pa la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ so sor yang gnas la mi gnas pa yang yod/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin so sor gnas pa yang ma yin pa yod do/ /so sor gnas la mi gnas pa
263b2('dul ba): ma yin pa ni 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs par gyur cing slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur la phas pham pa bzhi las nyes pa gang yang rung ba ma byung ba yin no/ /mi gnas la so sor gnas
263b3('dul ba): pa ma yin pa ni gang 'di ltar dge slong des phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur gyi ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs pa ma byas par gyur cing slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur ba'o/ /
263b4('dul ba): mi gnas la so sor yang gnas pa ni de 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa yang yin la/ phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur pa'o/ /mi gnas pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs
263b5('dul ba): pa'o/ btsun pa dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags sam/ u pA li dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi
263b6('dul ba): dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge
263b7('dul ba): 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong gis ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags sam/ u pA li dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong phas ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/
263b8('dul ba): dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa dbye ba ni gang / kha na ma tho dang ldan pa ni gang lags/ dbye ba ni dge 'dun no/ /kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa ni 'byed pa'o/ /
264a1('dul ba): btsun pa dge 'dun phye na cir 'gyur/ sbom po ste/ gsol ba dang las ma mnyan na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/ /btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi/ u pA li gang gi tshe ji snyed pa'i dge slong rnams mtshams su phyin/ bya ba
264a2('dul ba): la bab par gyur/ de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa las dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang yin par 'du shes te gso sbyong dang las tha dad du byed
264a3('dul ba): pa de ltar na dge 'dun bye ba zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun phye bas nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ nye pa sbom po'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i gang zag la gleng bar ma byed shig /dran par ma byed shig ces gsungs na/ de lta bu'i
264a4('dul ba): gang zag gang lags/ gang zag gang mdo sde 'dzin pa ma lta bu 'dzin pa/ bsod nams chen po/ 'khor g.yogs mang po/ grags pa de'o/ /de lta bu'i gang zag cig spangs na cir 'gyur/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /yul kau sham+bI ka'i dngos
264a5('dul ba): po rdzogs so/ / //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ mdor na/ skad dang nam mkha' mtshams dang sa/ /chos gnyis dang ni ma 'dus pa/ /chad pa khor dang gcig nas gcig /ma 'dus gang zag gnas de bzhin/ /btsun pa
264a6('dul ba): 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa'i dge slong ni 'das pa dang bcas
264a7('dul ba): pa'o/ /btsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni
264a8('dul ba): 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li las
264b1('dul ba): byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/
264b2('dul ba): u pA li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pas
264b3('dul ba): sa la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na las bgyis rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa las bgyid pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / btsun pa las bgyid pa
264b4('dul ba): nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol tu gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig bzhir bya'o/ /
264b5('dul ba): btsun pa sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li rung ste/ 'di ltar yang des sa la gnas pas grangs bskang zhing sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /
264b6('dul ba): ji ltar sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa dang lhan cig pa de bzhin du sa la gnas pa dang / rtsig pa la gnas par ro/ /sa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang rtsig pa las gnas par ro/ /
264b7('dul ba): rtsig pa la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang rtsig
264b8('dul ba): pa la gnas pa lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li rung ste/ ji ltar yang shing la gnas pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par
265a1('dul ba): byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du 'dus pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags te ma 'dus
265a2('dul ba): par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags par 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas la las bsgrags pa dang ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /
265a3('dul ba): chos bzhin du 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas shing las bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /gzhan yang las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par 'thun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin par 'thun la 'dus pa dang /
265a4('dul ba): chos bzhin du 'thun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du 'thun la 'dus pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par 'thun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar las bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par
265a5('dul ba): 'thun zhing 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar las bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du 'thun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas te las gzhan bsgrags la ma 'dus par yang gyur pa
265a6('dul ba): 'o/ /chos bzhin du 'thun la 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas shing las gzhan bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa ma 'dus pa'i las shes kyang bgyi/ 'dus pa'i las shes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa ma
265a7('dul ba): 'dus pa'i las gang lags/ u pA li dge slong ji snyed pa rnams kyis mtshams su yang phyin/ las la yang bab par gyur/ thams cad mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur na dge slong rnams
265a8('dul ba): ni zlog cig 'khyal te/ de dag slar zlog cing 'khyal bzhin du las byas na de ni ma 'dus pa'i las shes bya'o/ /'dus pa'i las gang zhe na/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnams mtshams su phyin cing las la bab par gyur/ thams cad
265b1('dul ba): kyang mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur dge slong dag slar mi zlog cing 'khyal bar mi byed de/ de dag slar mi zlog cing mi 'khyal bzhin du las byed pas na de ni 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o/ /
265b2('dul ba): btsun pa dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod nas las bgyis kyang las de ma 'dus pa'i las su 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de de ni 'di ltar gsol ba dang las byed pa na dge slong dag slar zlog cing 'khyal te/ de dag slar zlog cing 'khyal
265b3('dul ba): bzhin las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa las bgyid pa chad pa khor ba zhig gis las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa chad pa 'khor ba zhig gis dad pa
265b4('dul ba): blangs nas las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa dad pa gcig nas gcig tu blangs te las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/
265b5('dul ba): u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa ma 'dus par las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma byas zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /
265b6('dul ba): btsun pa gcig gis gcig la/ gcig gis gnyis la/ gcig gis gsum la/ gcig gis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa gnyis kyis gcig la/ gnyis kyis gnyis la/ gnyis kyis gsum la/ gnyis
265b7('dul ba): kyis mang po la las rnams bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa gsum gyis gcig la/ gsum gyis gnyis la/ gsum gyis gsum la/ gsum gyis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa mang pos mang po la las
265b8('dul ba): bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li mi rung ngo / /btsun pa las bgyid pa gnas gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir las thams cad bgyir rung ngam/ u pA li rung ste/ de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas bzhi char gyi mtshams shing ngam/ 'dam bu 'am/
266a1('dul ba): re ldes mnan te las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa las bgyid pas mtshams gcig par gsol ba gcig dang las gcig gis gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams
266a2('dul ba): gcig par mang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa dge slong gis mtshams gcig la mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la las bgyis kyang nongs par yang mi 'gyur la dge 'dun ma 'dus par yang mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/
266a3('dul ba): u pA li yod de/ dad pa byin pas so/ /btsun pa las bgyid pa'i dge slong gnas gcig na mchis pas gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na las de yang bgyis par 'gyur la dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis

266a5('dul ba): pa'o/ /mdor na/ mngon sum gyur dang snga ma dag /las rnam gsum dang shi ba dang / /mi spyad dang ni bde ba mtshams/ /nyes pa las kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du gyur pa la las rnams

266a7('dul ba): phyag mi bya ba'i sdom pa 'am longs spyod dang bral ba'i sdom pa byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis dge slong la smyon pa'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa sngar las bsgrags te phyis gsol ba bgyid na bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/

266b1('dul ba): bzod par bgyid na bzod pa bgyid pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li bzod pa byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pA li ma yin no/ /de bzhin du smad pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i

267b1('dul ba): dang / glen pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / yi dam las nyams pa dang / sngon nyes pa byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pa dang / smyon pa dang rnam pa bcus 'khrugs kyang 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
267b2('dul ba): na/ btsun pa de ste chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyid cing de dag kyang slar bzlog /slar dkrugs te/ de dag gis slar bzlog na slar dkrugs na slar dkrugs pa mi brtsan nam/ u pA li brtsan te/ ngas chos bzhin gyi las la dgongs te gsungs pas na/

267b6('dul ba): bgyi 'am kun du mi spyad par bgyi/ u pA li nye bar phyogs pa dang lhan cig kun tu mi spyad par bya'o/ /btsun pa spangs pa de grogs shes bgyi 'am/ grogs ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ u pA li spangs pa thams cad ni grogs ma yin pa zhes

267b8('dul ba): bzhin du dge 'dun la spu bsnyal te 'byung bar rtsol zhing phyag 'tshal bar ston mtshams kyi nang du 'dug nas bzod pa gsol te nyes pa mthol ba'o/ /btsun pa su gang la dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad nongs par
268a1('dul ba): 'gyur ram/ su gang la nongs pa byung ba de dag thams cad kyang lan gsum du bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ su gang zhig dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad la nyes par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa nongs pa byung yang de dge 'dun gyi nang du lan
268a2('dul ba): gsum du bsgo mi 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pA li yod de/ bsgo ba'i rigs pa zhig bsgo bar 'os pa ma gtogs par de las nyes pa gzhan byung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chos gang dang ldan pa'i dge slong de la sma dbab pa'i las dang spang ba'i
